definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: It will be a possession game virtually every game, probably to a fan's delight.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每场都会是寸土必争的比赛，也许正对球迷口味。

sentences.english: The center line of condenser shall be opposite to the exhaust end of syn gas compressor turbine.
sentences.chinese: 凝汽器中心线正对合成气压缩机透平排汽端。

sentences.english: The desensitisation of young men to gratuitously violent sexual acts is happening.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人正对无缘由的性暴力行为脱敏。
胆怯的影星不敢正对摄影机。

sentences.english: Mullah Baradar's capture comes amid a major Nato-led offensive against the Taliban in southern Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 在阿富汗南部地区，北约正对塔利班发动规模攻击。

sentences.english: The blogs are ranked by the number of clicks they receive.
sentences.chinese: 我们正对这些博客的点击率进行大排行。

sentences.english: This seat is close to the air-conditioning register. Would you like a wrap?
sentences.chinese: 这个位置正对空调出风口，您需要披肩吗？

sentences.english: Right to the opposite of Hongqiao Golf, the hotel lies perfectly in tranquility and elegance.
sentences.chinese: 酒店正对虹桥高尔夫球场，四周环境安静优美。

sentences.english: Some companies are training staffers to broaden their social-media efforts.
sentences.chinese: 有些公司正对员工进行培训，以扩大社交媒体宣传。

sentences.english: They are doing some research on the interaction between seawater and lava.
sentences.chinese: 他们正对海水与溶岩的相互作用进行研究。

sentences.english: A larger door, painted bright red, can be opened for transporting sculptures outside.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的门涂上红色，正对室外的雕塑。

sentences.english: The side of the moon facing the Earth and the side facing away have strikingly different topographies.
sentences.chinese: 正对和背对地球的月亮两侧地势差别明显。

sentences.english: The Complaints Commission is working through hundreds of allegations of serious fraud.
sentences.chinese: 投诉委员会正对数百宗严重欺诈的指控进行调查。

sentences.english: When he turned and confronted it, the thing had vanished.
sentences.chinese: 他回过头来正对它看时，那东西却倏忽不见了。

sentences.english: This detective novel meets my appetite.
sentences.chinese: 这本侦探小说正对我的胃口。

sentences.english: The adjective injected new acceptation into the objected cold article.
sentences.chinese: 这个形容词给受到正对的客观物体注入了新的意义。

definition: toward/to face/to open onto/to turn towards/orientation/exposure/Qibla (Islam)
middle/center/right in the middle or center/nub
to aim at/to target/to point at/to be directed at/registration/alignment (mechanical engineering)
to be right next to/to lean closely against
(literary and deferential) to solicit comments (on one's writing)
